item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (199 points | 152 comments)
2. You can use C-Reduce for any language (197 points | 37 comments)
3. Show HN: Feels Like Paper (95 points | 27 comments)
4. Device-detector: Universal Device Detection library from User Agent (22 points | 3 comments)
5. Show HN: App that asks ‘why?’ every time you unlock your phone (597 points | 303 comments)
6. Show HN: TeaTime – distributed book library powered by SQLite, IPFS and GitHub (34 points | 8 comments)
7. Over ½ of Long Posts on LinkedIn Are Likely AI-Generated Since ChatGPT Launched (45 points | 19 comments)
8. The capacitor that Apple soldered incorrectly at the factory (434 points | 170 comments)
9. Chebyshev Polynomials in the 16th Century (2022) (68 points | 24 comments)
10. Ancient Sumerians created the first writing system (111 points | 123 comments)
11. Hackerrank was broken – but now it's harmful (25 points | 9 comments)
12. Psychoacoustic and archeoacoustic nature of ancient Aztec skull whistles (19 points | 9 comments)
13. The Art and Mathematics of Genji-Ko (85 points | 3 comments)
14. Increasing testosterone levels does not increase sex drive (10 points | 7 comments)
15. Ultra-low-latency, batching and concurrent queue for IPC in Java (14 points | 1 comment)
16. Brain learning differs fundamentally from artificial intelligence systems (52 points | 22 comments)
17. QwQ: Alibaba's O1 Like Reasoning LLM (8 points | 1 comment)

19. Launch HN: Keep (YC W23) – AIOps and alert management (66 points | 23 comments)
20. 'Dear Mr. Kubrick': 1960s Audience Responses to 2001 — A Space Odyssey (2009) [pdf] (3 points | discuss)
21. Show HN: AutoPiP – Safari extension for automatic Picture-in-Picture mode (34 points | 11 comments)
22. Python type hints may not be not for me in practice (45 points | 63 comments)
23. London's 850-year-old food markets to close (10 points | discuss)
24. Prelude to McCarthyism: The Making of a Blacklist (2006) (43 points | 42 comments)
25. Janet for Mortals (2023) (213 points | 57 comments)
26. How Blackjack Works (2007) (34 points | 13 comments)
27. The US copyright office has struck down a major effort for game preservation (105 points | 122 comments)
28. Comparing AWS S3 with Cloudflare R2: Price, Performance and User Experience (150 points | 94 comments)
29. Malaria vaccine delivered by a mosquito bite (73 points | 146 comments)
30. Martha's Vineyard Sign Language (43 points | 7 comments)
